svg.title: Comparison gender life expectancy WHO-2019
svg.desc: Comparison of countries by life expectancy at birth according to estimation of the World Health Organization for 2019 (https://apps.who.int/gho/data/node.main.688). Squares of bubles are proportional to the population of countries, according to estimation of the United Nations for 2019 (https://population.un.org/wpp/Download/Files/1_Indicators%20(Standard)/EXCEL_FILES/1_Population/WPP2019_POP_F01_1_TOTAL_POPULATION_BOTH_SEXES.xlsx). Grouping of countries to subregions is according to the classification of the United Nations.

g.text: Male life expectancy at birth in years
Female life expectancy at birth in years

g.title: DR Congo (population: 86 791 000) male: 60.0, female: 64.8, overall: 62.4 years

Sierra Leone (population: 7 813 000) male: 59.6, female: 61.9, overall: 60.8 years

Central African Republic (population: 4 745 000) male: 50.2, female: 56.3, overall: 53.1 years
Equatorial Guinea (population: 1 356 000) male: 60.9, female: 63.6, overall: 62.2 years
Cabo Verde (population: 550 000) male: 69.9, female: 77.9, overall: 74.0 years
